A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All in all great movie. Finn's story arc was impressive\, we get to see Leia at her best. The development of Luke and Mark Hamill's acting were incredible. I really appreciated the easter eggs and bits that they threw in. 4.5 stars because some of the CG was spotty\, mostly the porgs\, but only a half point because of the amazing visuals in the end battle.
